description: I really want to use it, but all the fonts are square boxes and can't read anything. Any suggestions or a fix would be awesome.
how do you even get a wii/gamecube iso

So The Dolphin Emulator, a bit of information, Website : https://dolphin-emu.org/download/ you can download the Dolphin version 4.0 for Ubuntu 13.04, I think this download is great because it is Dolphin 5.0 and I am running Ubuntu 22.10 The Latest version at this time (November 2022) , You can download it on mostly anything , any device, dolphin 5.0 will also work on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS and 22.04 LTS. It works on Android and you can also get it on IOS as well, I have used it on Android in the past and it works super fast for Wii games , I played Animal Crossing City Folk or Let's Go To The City on Android and it works fast you can control the speed to make it faster just edit the config file with a text editor , Gamecube games also work well and for Wii Games you can play them Online with your friends in 2022 with Wiimmfi and that's right you can play with your friends who have real wiis, you can connect a Wiimote (Wii remote) and Gamecube controller , Dolphin works on Apple's Mac OS too and Microsoft Windows , for Android it works on Mostly any version probably just make sure you're using Android 5 or above and a fast processor , RAM recommended would be 4GB as well. If it works slow for you change the settings there are plenty of changes you need to make just to make it work on your computer or phone , you can also play wii channels like the Mii Channel and if you're a Riiconnect24 user you can get the News Channel as well. This App Works well I totally recommend you download and install it now . Where to get games well there are plenty of sites out there where you can download Wii and Gamecube games free , I recommend Vimm's Lair . Thanks and Have a Good Day Or Night!
summary: Dolphin Emulator For Nintendo Wii And Nintendo Gamecube Games
